Class nl.ru.bcigames.ServerWrapper.Subscriber

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.ru.bcigames.ServerWrapper.Subscriber

  • public class nl.ru.bcigames.ServerWrapper.Subscriber
extends java.lang.Object
    A subscriber can listen to events send to the server.

      • addListenerWrapper

        public void addListenerWrapper(java.lang.String targetkey,
                               java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> fun)
        Wrapper to set up an nl.ru.bcigames.ServerWrapper.SubscribeEvent more easily. Example usage: nl.ru.bcigames.ServerWrapper.Subscriber.addListenerWrapper("key", (targetValue) -> {System.out.println(targetValue);return "";});
        Parameters:
        targetkey - the key to check for in the events
        fun - an anonymus function that decides what happens with the value of the message received
